Check description: By default and until the form is filled in, the "Link" button in the "Add card" window is inactive
Clicking the "Add card" button opens the "Add card" window

When valid values "836467327491" are entered into the "Card number" field and the field loses focus, the system automatically inserts spaces in the nnnn nnnn nnnn format; the displayed value is "8364 6732 7491"
Clicking the "Link" button navigates back to the "Payment method" window
After exiting the "Add card" form, the linked card is displayed in the "Payment method" window in the "Card nnnn" format, where nnnn are the last four digits of the card number
If only one card is added, it is selected automatically
When 12 valid characters "327491836467" are entered into the "Card number" field, the system accepts the input
When 7 characters "8597365" are entered into the "Card number" field, the "Link" button remains inactive
When valid values in the range from 0000 to 9999 inclusive are entered into the "Card number" field as "666666666666", the system accepts the input
When digits and special characters "7462965837$%" are entered into the "Card number" field, the system does not accept the input
When valid values in the range from 01 to 99 inclusive are entered into the "Code" field as "99", the system accepts the input
When a digit and a letter "3D" are entered into the "Code" field, the system does not accept the input
When 12 valid characters "327491836467" are entered into the "Card number" field and 2 valid characters "76" are entered into the "Code" field, the "Link" button becomes active
